1460280.name: Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story Soundtrack
1460280.description:
Own the original video game soundtrck by James Elsey.

Featuring epic scores and relaxing ambience, sit back and enjoy some incredible music from one of the UK's rising composers! Experience almost an hour of immersive music. Low droney synths and classical instrumental music come together to set the mood, with the soundtrack arranged to give a glimpse into the story of Grey Skies.
